item.title: Windsurf: OpenAI’s potential $3B bet to drive the ‘vibe coding’ movement
item.description: A Windsurf deal would allow OpenAI to own more of the full-stack coding experience (and it would be its most expensive acquisition to date).

item.title: Google’s Gemini 2.5 Flash introduces ‘thinking budgets’ that cut AI costs by 600% when turned down

item.title: New method lets DeepSeek and other models answer ‘sensitive’ questions
item.description: Enterprise risk company CTGT said their method cuts bias and censorship in models like DeepSeek.

item.title: BigQuery is 5x bigger than Snowflake and Databricks: What Google is doing to make it even better
item.description: Google ramps up the competition in the enterprise data space claiming its AI innovation help it to leapfrog rivals.
